newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Brooks Fiber rated buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Brooks Fiber rated buy.

text.p: -- Chicago Corp said it initiated coverage of Brooks Fiber Properties Inc with a buy rating and a price target of $48 a share.
-- Brooks Fiber shares were up 1/2 at 33.
-- Brooks Fiber, a competitive local exchange carrier, is expected to have systems in operation or under construction in a total of 50 cities by the end of 1998.
-- Chicago Corp said in a report dated Monday that Brooks Fiber's operations are poised for higher revenue, which could grow from an estimated $47 million in 1996 to more than $1 billion by 2001.
-- It said it conservatively estimates Brooks Fiber will report negative earnings before interest, taxes, depreciation and amortization (EBITDA) until 1998, and negative earnings until 2000.
